name: Triple Progression Model (6-8 reps, 3 sets)
overview_and_execution: Select a weight you can do for 3×6. Each week aim to progress reps up to 3×8. Once you can do 3×8 with good form, increase the weight and return to 3×6.
example_application: DB Shoulder Press: 50 lb x 3×6. Next session try 3×7. Once you can do 3×8, go to 55 lb x 3×6.
important_notes: Simple progressive overload. Great for beginner/intermediate lifters. Manage rest intervals (90-120s) consistently.
volume_metrics: 3 sets, up to 24 total reps at top end
